about_the_game:
game Introduction

This is a positioning training tool specifically designed for MOBA game enthusiasts. The overall design of the game is based on a well-known MOBA game, accurately recreating the authentic combat perspective and gameplay mechanics, providing players with an immersive positioning training environment. Whether you are a MOBA fanatic looking to enhance your skills or a dodging game lover who enjoys challenging your reaction speed, this game will become your indispensable training partner.

game Content

The game includes a variety of classic equipment and equipment skills from popular MOBA games, such as the stasis effect of Zhonya's Hourglass and cleanse items, helping players better master survival techniques in intense battles.

It also offers a selection of universal skills (summoner skills) that aid in survival, allowing players to flexibly combine them and practice timing and reaction speed in using these skills.

Special Training

The game has created dedicated training modes for using the Cleanse and Flash skills. Still amazed by pro players instantly removing control effects with Cleanse? You can do it too!

name: MOBA Dodge Trainer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A dodging skills trainer specifically developed for MOBA game players. Want to show off your maneuvering and reaction skills to your friends? Then try to survive as long as possible against an endless barrage of attacking skills!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
